artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Claude-Louis Desrais; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: From fashion periodical (P.15,184.1); a woman holding a walking stick in a gown with a white skirt, pink vest, green coat, and a green and purple striped hat with purple ribbon and pink, purple, and green plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate II from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Quatorzième Cahier, 30 Mars 1787
